stories.text:
Hey HN community,

We just launched Xenilla - a blockchain focused weekly newsletter for both developers and investors and we'd like to hear your feedback about the content and the format.

You can read the 1st issue here (https://factory.faun.dev/newsletters/i/sell-your-github-commits-as-nfts-dc75a585-1925-4ef7-89eb-f9e611d8a14b)

Each week, we curate the best articles/news/videos/tools from last week. These are the best curated articles from last week:

- A Comprehensive Guide on Blockchain Traceability: https://faun.to/YYzbv - Biggest Blockchain Companies in 2021: https://faun.to/mlMps - The N Project: NFTs of Random Numbers Hit $40 Million Market Cap: https://faun.to/MdRDN - Autograph and sell your GitHub commits as NFTs: https://faun.to/OZ0s0

If you're a Blockchain developer/investor, we'd like to hear your suggestions about the topics you'd like to read about, we'll take your suggestions into consideration!

( If you want to give it a try and receive next week issue, you'll need to signup here: https://faun.dev/join )
